sentences.sContent: The blood tests prove that Vince is indeed the father.
sentences.sCn: 验血证明文斯确实是父亲。

sentences.sContent: ‘Would it help if you had an assistant?’ ‘It would indeed.’
sentences.sCn: “你要是有个助手，会有帮助吗？”“那是肯定的。

sentences.sContent: ...Curious if the left hemispheres were indeed remaining awake to process information detected in the surrounding environment...
...And there was indeed a personal link...

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize a statement or answer
